name: Study Die Repeat
description:
Ever feel like you've lived the same day before?  Bit of deja vu?  Try that but in a world filled with monsters and magic!

Set in a magic school, SDR: Study Die Repeat uses elements of top-down,  dungeon crawler style action games like Diablo. Using your might and magic, navigate through the labyrinthic halls of the school whilst trying to make it to a magic pocket watch and fix the flow of time.

Battle using your trusty sword and fireball that can be upgraded with every new run.

Fight against enemies like giant spiders, slimes, and dragon whelp

Play the loop. Fight, die, retry as you upgrade your strength and magic with each new attempt you make.

Take a step into the past with graphics inspired by old polygonal games like tomb raider and RuneScape

Discover the story of a watchmaker and his quest to save a loved one by finding torn pages across the school.

Movement - WASD

Physical Attack - Left Mouse

Magical Attack - Right Mouse

Interact - Space

Pause - Esc

This project is made by a group of year 3 students for their final major project.
